short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple game about collecting fruit and vibing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple game made for that time when you are bored and have nothing better to do with your life than play video games on the internet but can't find anything that interests you. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, S (or the down arrow key) slows down time, Space can be used to jump, and P will pause the game.
